collection.title: Shop by Product
collection.body_html: Find exactly what you're looking for. Our baby tableware is organised by product type to make your shopping experience simple and intuitive. Browse our collections of plates, bowls, cups, cutlery, and bibs to find the perfect addition to your mealtime routine.

products.title: Adorable Kawaii Bear Ceramic Bowl - Perfect for Fruits, Noodles, and Salads - Cute Korean Kitchen Tableware and Utensils
products.body_html:
Introducing the Kawaii Bear Bowl Plate - a delightful addition to your kitchen that combines functionality with adorable design! Perfect for kids and the young at heart, this cute ceramic bowl is perfect for serving breakfast, salads, fruits, and more, making every meal a joyful experience.

Â 

Highlights

Experience the charm of our bear bowl and plate, crafted with high-quality ceramics that ensure durability and style.

Featuring a creative bear design, these pieces are not only easy to hold but also anti-scalding, making them safe for everyone.

With a comfortable texture and easy-to-clean surface, these bowls are ideal for everyday use.

Made from matte porcelain, please note that these items are not microwave or oven safe but are dishwasher friendly for effortless cleaning.

Specification

Material: Ceramics

Size: Approximately 6 inches and 8 inches

Notice

- Don't forget to follow our store for exclusive discounts available only to our fans!

- Due to variations in measurement methods, please allow for slight size deviations. Color discrepancies may occur due to different monitor settings. Thank you for your understanding.

- We are committed to providing you with the best product and service. If you encounter any issues, please reach out to us, and we will resolve them promptly. Thank you for your support!

Product Details

Package Contents

1 x Bowl or Plate

Notices

1. We welcome both wholesale and drop shipping orders. You can place orders as needed, and we will strive to ship your products as quickly as possible.

2. Please note that buyers are responsible for any customs taxes that may apply. We are unable to cover customs charges.

3. Ensure that the consignee's information is accurate when placing your order. Russian customers must provide their full name.

Customer Service

1. All products undergo careful inspection and are packed securely before shipping.

2. If you are satisfied with our products and services, please leave positive feedback and a 5-star rating. Your feedback is invaluable to us.

3. If you are not completely satisfied, please contact us before leaving a negative or neutral review. We are dedicated to resolving any issues for you.

products.title: Blue Mickey Mouse Birthday Party Essentials: Disposable Cups, Plates, and Tablecloth for Kids' Celebrations
products.body_html:
Transform your child's birthday celebration into a magical experience with our Blue Mickey Mouse Kids Birthday Party Balloon Paper Cups Plates Tablecloth Baby Shower Decorations!

These vibrant and charming party supplies feature the beloved Mickey Mouse character, perfect for creating a fun and festive atmosphere that your little ones will adore.

Color: As shown in the picture, featuring a delightful blue theme that complements any Mickey Mouse party.

Condition: 100% Brand new and high quality, ensuring durability and reliability for your special event.

Occasion: Ideal for birthday parties, baby showers, graduation celebrations, and various festive gatherings. These decorations are versatile and can be used for home decorations, conference events, campus activities, and more!

Note:

Different screens may produce a slight color variation; if you are particular about colors, please consider this before purchasing.


If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team for support.

products.title: Cute Cartoon Bear 3-Piece Baby Feeding Set - Bowl, Spoon & Fork for Safe and Fun Mealtime!
products.body_html:
Â 

Introducing our delightful 3Pcs/Set Baby Bowl, Spoon, and Fork Feeding Food Tableware featuring an adorable Cartoon Bear design! This charming dinnerware set is perfect for your little ones, making mealtime fun and enjoyable while ensuring safety and practicality.


Â 

High-Quality Materials:
Crafted from a combination of Wheat Straw and PP, this dinnerware set is both eco-friendly and durable. Unlike silicone, our materials are safe for your child and free from harmful chemicals, ensuring a worry-free dining experience.

Perfectly Sized for Little Hands:
The bowl measures 20cm x 20cm, providing ample space for your child's favorite meals. The spoon and fork are designed for easy handling, each measuring 15.5cm x 3.3cm, making them ideal for little hands learning to eat independently.

Anti-Hot Training Plate:
The bowl's unique design helps prevent overheating, making it suitable for serving warm meals without the risk of burns. This feature is essential for parents who want to encourage their kids to explore new foods safely.

Fun and Engaging Design:
The Cartoon Bear theme adds a playful touch to your child's dining experience, encouraging them to enjoy their meals and develop healthy eating habits. The vibrant colors and cute design will surely capture your child's attention.

Lightweight and Convenient:
Weighing in at approximately 125g, this dinnerware set is lightweight and easy to handle, making it perfect for home use or on-the-go dining. Whether at a picnic, playdate, or traveling, this set is a fantastic companion.

Note:

1. Due to different monitors and light effects, the actual color of the item may vary slightly from the pictures.Â 
2. Due to manual measurement, please allow a 1-3cm measuring deviation.
3. Each bowl may have small mold interface dots at the bottom, which do not affect its use. If this is a concern, please consider this before ordering.

Make mealtime a delightful experience for your little one with our 3Pcs/Set Baby Bowl, Spoon, and Fork Feeding Food Tableware! Order now and watch your child enjoy their meals with joy and excitement!

products.title: Magic Baby Learning Cup - Leakproof 240ml Drinkware for Easy Sips!
products.body_html:
Introducing the Magic Baby Cups - the perfect solution for your little one's drinking needs! These innovative learning cups are designed to make drinking fun and easy for babies aged 1-2 years. With a unique 360-degree design, your child can sip from any angle without the mess, making it a leakproof companion for water, juice, or milk.

Description

Feature: 360 Degree Magic Cup - No more spills, just fun!

Capacity: 240ML - Perfectly sized for tiny hands and growing appetites.

Product Name: Baby Training Cups - Helping your child transition to independent drinking with ease.

products.title: Princess - Toddler Learning to Sit Support Seat | Plush Baby Sofa
products.body_html:
A recurring issue of a baby struggling to sit up on their own can be a source of stress and worry. Without a proper support solution, a baby may topple over, be uncomfortable, and face a general lack of a safe space to practice this critical milestone. The constant struggle with these issues can result in frustration, fatigue, and unpreparedness, highlighting the crucial need for an effective and reliable solution like a dedicated Baby Sofa Support Seat Cover.


A proper Baby Sofa Support Seat Cover features a contoured design, a secure bottom, and a washable, plush material for optimal convenience and safety. These items are designed to make learning to sit easier, reduce the risk of injury, and ensure a baby is comfortably and securely supported. This proactive approach to a baby's development provides a smoother, more enjoyable family experience.







REASONS WHY A BABY SOFA SUPPORT SEAT COVER WILL CHANGE A BABY'S EXPERIENCE


â ENHANCED SUPPORT FOR LEARNING TO SIT: A sturdy Baby Sofa Support Seat Cover is crucial for providing a stable and secure base for a baby. This enhanced support makes it an indispensable tool for helping a baby learn to sit upright and preventing falls.

â SOFT & PLUSH COMFORT: The cover is crafted from soft, plush material, providing a cozy and comfortable seat. This added comfort encourages a baby to practice sitting more, making the experience more pleasant.


Â 


â EASY-TO-CLEAN & HYGIENIC: The cover is designed to be easily removable and washable. This feature effortlessly manages spills and messes, ensuring a baby's seat is always clean and hygienic.

â LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: A Baby Sofa Support Seat Cover is lightweight and easy to move from room to room. Its simple design allows for easy placement, accommodating a baby's needs for practice anywhere in the house.


Â 


â VERSATILE USE: While perfect for learning to sit, this cover can also be used as a cozy floor seat for playtime, reading, or watching. Its versatility ensures it can be used for various purposes as a baby grows.



HOW TO USE A BABY SOFA SUPPORT SEAT COVER


1. Insert a Filling: The cover is designed to be filled with soft material, such as cotton or foam, to create a plump, supportive seat.

2. Secure the Baby: Gently place a baby in the seat, ensuring a proper, comfortable fit with their legs through the designated openings.

3. Supervise Playtime: Allow a baby to practice sitting, play, or relax in the chair, enjoying the soft and secure support it provides.

4. Clean as Needed: To clean, unzip and remove the cover, and wash it according to the care instructions.



A stubborn problem of a baby being unsteady, the frustration of them toppling over, and the difficulty of finding an effective, on-demand solution often trigger stress, a lack of cleanliness, and disappointment. Relying on an inadequate setup or a non-specialized solution can increase a person's effort and reduce the quality of much-needed family time.


A proper Baby Sofa Support Seat Cover combines enhanced safety with comfortable, easy-to-clean designs. Built-in versatility actively addresses a baby's changing needs, while its simplicity ensures a seamless experience. Each feature enhances a parent's peace of mind, promotes healthy development, and improves overall comfort, making this product an indispensable tool for anyone seeking a convenient and effective way to manage a baby's developmental milestones.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Crystal Velvet (Seat Cover), Cloth (Overall)

Dimensions: 45 x 50 cm

Suitable for: Ages 0-3 years

Colors: Blue, Green, Grey, Pink

Package Includes:

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  1 x Seat Cover

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  1 x Game Rod (Random Color)

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  1 Set x Toys (Random)

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  1 x Mat

Package Size: 450 x 280 x 130 mm or 400 x 350 x 140 mm

Â 

Â 

A Nestacular Promise

products.title: Ultimate Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - Ideal Training Tableware for Little Ones!
products.body_html:
Introducing our Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - the ultimate training tableware designed specifically for your little ones! This innovative set is perfect for encouraging your child to eat independently while minimizing mess at mealtime.

Features:

  • Secure Suction Cup Base: The bowl is equipped with a TPE material suction cup at the bottom, providing high elasticity and anti-aging properties. This clever design ensures the bowl stays firmly in place, preventing spills and making mealtime a breeze.
  • Lightweight & Easy to Clean: Made from durable PP material, the bowl is lightweight and easy to handle. It's also high temperature resistant, making it suitable for all types of food. Cleanup is a snap - simply wash with water or place it in the dishwasher!
  • Temperature-Sensitive Spoon: Our set includes a specially designed spoon that changes color when the food temperature exceeds 40 degrees Celsius, allowing you to ensure your child's food is safe to eat.
  • Insulated Lid: The ingeniously designed suction cup comes with a lid for added insulation, keeping food warm longer and making it perfect for on-the-go meals.
  • Pre-Use Preparation: For best results, wash the bowl with water and place it in boiling water for 2-3 minutes before use to ensure optimal suction.

Specifications:

  • Material: PP + TPE
  • Color: As shown in images
  • Bowl Size: 16*6cm
  • Spoon Size: 13*2.5cm

Package Includes:

  • Set 1: 1 bowl + 1 cover + 1 spoon
  • Set 2: 1 bowl + 1 fork + 1 spoon

Rest assured, this product is 100% brand new and of high quality, certified safe for your little ones. Ideal for babies aged 7-12 years, this bowl set is free from harmful chemicals and PVC, making it a safe choice for your child's dining experience.

Don't miss out on this essential mealtime companion! Add our store to your Favorite Stores to stay updated on new arrivals and exclusive discounts!
